<body>
<h1>

About me

 </h1>
I'm Ayyoube Chabih. I'm 2rd year student specialised Master Quality of Software at the FSDM (Faculty of Sciences Dhar El Mehraz) of Fez (Morocco).

Well-organised person, problem solver, independent with high attention to detail. Interested in the entire in building softwares, web developement spectrum and working on ambitious projects with positive people.

I love building things, working in a groupe and I'm most attracted to solving problems.
</body>

console.log('Chabih Ayyoube');

<body>
<h1>

Skills

 </h1>

The main area of my expertise is front end development (client side of the web).

HTML, CSS, JS (TypeScript), building small and medium web apps with Angular 2+, animations, and coding interactive layouts.

I am also full-stack developer with Node.js, Java/JavaEE, Spring, JSF, and Struts2.

Visit my LinkedIn profile for more details or my Github profile to see my code.

</body>
